title: What are the specifications of the iPhone 13 Pro? - Quora

response.answer_text: Officially, Apple has not yet provided any information related to the Iphone 13 series Iphones. Because they will launch them in 2021.  But some leaks and rumors have given some information related to the iPhone 13 pro and iPhone 13 series and their specifications Although these are just rumors but still you can read 1 . iPhone 13 will come with be full screen which means no notch concept like previous generation Iphones 2. Will come with reverse wireless charging 3. Iphone 13 series will have smart-connector which might be on top or on the bottom of the sides of the phone. 4. Iphone 13 Will be port less. Camera specifications
